it.disi.unitn.videocreator.filtergraph.filterchain.filters.videofilters.buffer.Buffer
public class Buffer extends VideoFilter
This class implements FFmpeg's "buffer" filter.

  • Method Details

    • setVideoSize

      public void setVideoSize(int width, int height) throws InvalidArgumentException, UnsupportedOperationException
      Sets the filter's video_size parameter. This cannot be done if the width and height parameters have already been set.
      Parameters:
      width - The video's width
      height - The video's height
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the video's width or height are less than or equal to zero
      UnsupportedOperationException - If the video's width and height were already set by setVideoWidthAndHeight()

    • setVideoWidthAndHeight

      public void setVideoWidthAndHeight(int width, int height) throws InvalidArgumentException, UnsupportedOperationException
      Sets the input video's width and height. This cannot be done if the filter's video_size parameter was already set.
      Parameters:
      width - The input video's width
      height - The input video's height
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the given width and height were less than or equal to zero
      UnsupportedOperationException - If the filter's video_size parameter was already set

    • setPixFmt

      public void setPixFmt(@NotNull @NotNull String pix_fmt) throws InvalidArgumentException
      Sets the filter's pix_fmt parameter.
      Parameters:
      pix_fmt - The pixel's format
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the given pixel format is null or an empty string

    • setTimeBase

      public void setTimeBase(@NotNull @NotNull String time_base) throws InvalidArgumentException
      Sets the filter's time_base parameter.
      Parameters:
      time_base - The given time_base value
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the given time_base value is null or an empty string

      public void setFrameRate(int frame_rate) throws InvalidArgumentException

      Parameters:

      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the given frame rate is less than or equal to zero
